global.response: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="www.w3.org/.../soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="www.w3.org/.../XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="www.w3.org/.../XMLSchema"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <soap:Code> <soap:Value>soap:Receiver</soap:Value> </soap:Code> <soap:Reason> <soap:Text xml:lang="en">Server was unable to process request.</soap:Text> </soap:Reason> <soap:Detail /> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
